front.title: •Death Mark
front.gametext: Use 3 Force to deploy on any exterior planet site. Target an opponent's smuggler. Each turn opponent must lose 1 Force at beginning of opponent's control phase. Utinni Effect canceled when reached by target (target goes to Used Pile).
front.lore: 'A death mark's not an easy thing to live with. You're a good fighter, Solo. I hate to lose you.'

combo: Death Mark + Ice Storm Use Ice Storm to cause the smuggler, and rescue parties, to become missing.
